name: Redwood Peak
clueText: Up high where science kisses the trees. Park where learning meets redwoods, then follow the path to the view.
hint: Look near the bench with the wide view.

name: Lake Temescal
clueText: Find the sign by the waterline that matches your photo fragment.
hint: South trail, closer to the water.

name: Devil's Slide
clueText: The cliffside sings. What guards this path? Enter the code word.
hint: Count the plaques at the north vista.

name: Fitzgerald Marine Reserve
clueText: Match the bluffside angle from your photo card exactly.
hint: Up on the bluffs looking north.

name: San Benito House
clueText: The cantina awaits. Present yourselves for glory (and churro bites).
